snippet.title: The Caves of Olympus walkthrough (Apple II - Sams Software)
snippet.description:
"On the devastated planet Olympus, beneath the ruined palace of the Emperor, lie the Caves of Olympus, the last fortress to withstand the onslaught of the evil Laren hordes.

You are Anson Argyrus, an advanced Vario-500 robot. Stranded and alone, you must make your way through the caves to safety and freedom. Cunning is your ally, reasoning is your weapon, as you battle against the destruction waiting at every turn - false chambers, one way doors, death traps. But negotiate the caves successfully, and you'll escape to join the rebel forces gathering to counter the Laren invaders."

The Caves of Olympus (http://www.mobygames.com/game/caves-of-olympus) was a graphics adventure game created by Advanced Operating Systems and published by Sams Software in 1982 for the Apple ][. Hope you enjoy the walkthrough!

The long play is done by Smartadventurer, a program that I wrote to automate the playing for vintage Apple ][ games. You can follow the project here: https://vinniethelung.wordpress.com/tag/smartadventurer/

Credits:
Cover art - www.mocagh.com
Walkthrough - www.solutionarchive.com (Matthew Barton)
Disk image - 4AM
